meanings.definition: To restrict or confine someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The chains shacklebones the prisoner to the wall.
meanings.sent2: Please don't shacklebones the creativity of the children.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick seemed to shacklebones time itself.
